mainEntity.name: How to convert PDF file to photo?

acceptedAnswer.text:
Convert PDF to JPG using PDFtoconverte.com

mainEntity.name: How to convert PDF to JPG using Adobe Acrobat?

acceptedAnswer.text:
To convert PDF to JPG using Adobe Acrobat, follow these steps:

1. Launch Adobe Acrobat.

2. Click the File menu and select Import.

3. Select PDF Files and click Open.

4. Select the PDF file you want to convert and click Save.

5. Click the Output Format tab and select JPEG.

6. Click Save.

mainEntity.name: How to convert a PDF to image (JPG) in MAC?

acceptedAnswer.text: To convert PDF to image ( jpg ) in MAC, first open the PDF file in Preview or other PDF editor. Select File > Export > Image. In the Export Image window, select Format > JPEG (or other desired format). In the filename field, type the filename for the image file. Click Save.

mainEntity.name: How to transform PDF file to image (JPG , png , bmp) in Windows?

acceptedAnswer.text:
There are various ways to transform a PDF file to an image in Windows. One way is to use the Windows Image Acquisition (WIA) tool.
also you can use Adobe Acrobat's PDF to Image feature. 
Another way to transform a PDF file to an image is to use a  pdf to image conversion tool, such as the free PDFtoConverter.com .

mainEntity.name: How to convert PDF to JPG online?

acceptedAnswer.text:
- Drag and drop your file in the PDF to images converter.
- Select 'upload and convert' 
- Wait until the files are processed and after the "File Successfully Converted" message is displayed, you can download the files.
- Download the converted files as single JPG or PNG OR BMP files, or collectively in a ZIP file.

mainEntity.name: How to transform pdf to jpg in adobe photoshop ?

acceptedAnswer.text:
To transform a PDF to a JPG in Adobe Photoshop, follow these steps:

1. Launch Adobe Photoshop.
2. Click File > Import > PDF.
3. Select the PDF file you want to convert.
4. Click the Import button.
5. In the Import PDF dialog box, select the destination folder.
6. Click the Export button.
7. In the Export PDF dialog box, select the destination format.
8. Click the OK button.
